segments.text: I found out when Jim's birthday is . It's this Friday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's plan a surprise party for him !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you spread the word and ask everyone to bring some kind of snack food ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Will you call his wife and let her know so that if she is available , she can come too ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know how old he is though .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's O . K . Maybe his wife will spill the beans !
segments.speaker: S2
